Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleEmpty:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains no ores in any significant quantity.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceEmpty:
A rock that contains no ores in any significant quantity.
Nothing can be done with this, aside from trashing it out.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleTitaniumCopp:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains chunks of titanium and traces of copper.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceTitaniu: A mix of sediment, chunks of titanium and traces of copper. Without significant processing, the copper cannot be extracted in any meaningful quantity.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleCopperSilver:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains chunks of copper and traces of silver.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceCopperS: A mix of sediment, chunks of copper and traces of silver. Without significant processing, the silver cannot be extracted in any meaningful quantity.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleQuartzDiamon:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains chunks of quartz and traces of diamonds.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceQuartzD: A mix of sediment, chunks of quartz and traces of diamonds. Without significant processing, the diamonds cannot be extracted in any meaningful quantity.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleSilverGold:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains chunks of silver and traces of gold.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceSilverG: A mix of sediment, chunks of silver and traces of gold. Without significant processing, the gold cannot be extracted in any meaningful quantity.
